winterhold:GainStrengthWhenComboReachesM.NAME: Elemental Flow
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain {strengthAmount} strength when your #yCombo reaches a multiple of 5.

winterhold:SingePower.NAME: Singe
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, take #b
At the end of its turn, takes #b

winterhold:SlowBurnPower.NAME: Slow Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked winterhold:Fire damage, apply #b{amount} #ySinge.

winterhold:FireRunePower.NAME: Fire Rune
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you're attacked, deal #b{amount} winterhold:Fire damage to your attacker.

winterhold:SimonSaysPower.NAME: Simon Says
DESCRIPTIONS: If you deal {damageType} next, gain {strengthAmount} #yStrength. If you don't, lose all #yStrength.

winterhold:ConductivityPower.NAME: Conductivity
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, all winterhold:Shock damage ignores Block.
This turn, all winterhold:Shock damage ignores Block and is increased by #b{amount}.
